SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class GameHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.GameHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameHandler extends Object implements Serializable
Server side representation of a single game, used to implement the multiple games additional feature It contains the model and controller of a game
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameHandler

      public GameHandler(int gameId, Server server, int desiredNumberOfPlayers)
      Constructor of GameHandler
      Parameters:
      gameId - the id of the game
      server - a reference to the Server
      desiredNumberOfPlayers - the amount of players needed to start the game

  • Method Details

    • getReadyStatus

      public HashMap<String,Boolean> getReadyStatus()
      Get the ready status of the players
      Returns:
      readyStatus HashMap

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()
      Get the game associated with the GameHandler
      Returns:
      the game model

    • addPlayerToGame

      public Game addPlayerToGame(int gameId, String username) throws GameAlreadyStartedException
      Adds a players to the game after checking that the player can join
      Parameters:
      gameId - the id of the game
      username - the username of the player
      Returns:
      a reference to the game model
      Throws:
      GameAlreadyStartedException - if the game has already started

    • addClient

      public void addClient(ClientHandlerInterface client)
      Adds a client to the list of clients
      Parameters:
      client - a reference to the ClientHandlerInterface to add

    • removeClient

      public void removeClient(ClientHandlerInterface client)
      Removes a client from the game if the client quits or is disconnected Also ends the game if the client is the only one left and no other player reconnects
      Parameters:
      client - a reference to the ClientHandlerInterface to remove

    • setReady

      public ArrayList<Integer> setReady(String username) throws IOException
      When the player is ready to start the game this method is called
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the ready player
      Returns:
      two Integer values that are respectively the amount of player needed to start the game and the players currently ready
      Throws:
      IOException - when it fails to communicate with the client

    • subscribe

      public void subscribe(ClientHandlerInterface client) throws IOException, GameAlreadyStartedException
      Observer pattern subscribe
      Parameters:
      client - the client to subscribe to the game
      Throws:
      IOException - when it fails to communicate with the client
      GameAlreadyStartedException - when the game has already started

    • playCard

      public Player playCard(Player player, PlayableCard cardOnField, PlayableCard cardInHand, AngleOrientation orientation) throws InvalidCardPositionException, NotExistingPlayerException, RequirementsNotMetException, CardTypeMismatchException, AngleAlreadyLinkedException
      Play a card from the player hand to the player field
      Parameters:
      player - the player that has to play the card
      cardOnField - the card on the field where the card has to be played
      cardInHand - the card that has to be played from the hand
      orientation - the angle where the card has to be played
      Returns:
      the player that has played the card
      Throws:
      InvalidCardPositionException - if the card position is invalid
      CardTypeMismatchException - if the card type doesn't match
      RequirementsNotMetException - if the requirements are not met
      AngleAlreadyLinkedException - if the angle is already linked
      NotExistingPlayerException - if the player doesn't exist

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(String username, CardType cardType, DrawPosition drawPosition) throws NotExistingPlayerException, AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException, DeckIsEmptyException
      Draw a card from the drawing field adn check if the decks are empty
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player that has to draw the card
      cardType - the type of the card that has to be drawn
      drawPosition - the position from where the card has to be drawn
      Throws:
      DeckIsEmptyException - if the deck is empty
      AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException - if the player already has three cards in his hand
      NotExistingPlayerException - if the player doesn't exist

    • drawRandomCard

      public void drawRandomCard(String username)
      Draw a random card when the player quits the game mid-turn
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player that has to draw the card

      Returns:

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer(String username) throws NotExistingPlayerException
      Gets a player from the game with the given username
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      Returns:
      a reference to the player
      Throws:
      NotExistingPlayerException - when the player is not found

    • setMarker

      public void setMarker(Player player, Marker marker) throws NotAvailableMarkerException, NotExistingPlayerException
      Sets the marker for the player
      Parameters:
      player - the player that is choosing
      marker - the marker to choose
      Throws:
      NotAvailableMarkerException - when the marker is not available
      NotExistingPlayerException - when the player doesn't exist

    • turnEvent

      public void turnEvent(String username) throws NotExistingPlayerException
      Updates the game when a player has played their turn It also checks end game conditions
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player that has played the turn
      Throws:
      NotExistingPlayerException - when the player doesn't exist

    • setStarterCardSide

      public void setStarterCardSide(Player player, StarterCard starterCard, Side side) throws NotExistingPlayerException
      Sets the side of the starter card for the player
      Parameters:
      player - the player choosing the card
      starterCard - the starter card chosen
      side - the side of the card
      Throws:
      NotExistingPlayerException - when the player doesn't exist

      public void setSecretObjectiveCard(Player player, ObjectiveCard chosenObjectiveCard) throws NotExistingPlayerException

      Parameters:
      player - the player choosing the card
      chosenObjectiveCard - the objective card chosen
      Throws:
      NotExistingPlayerException - when the player doesn't exist

    • unsubscribe

      public void unsubscribe(String username)
      Observer pattern unsubscribe
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player to unsubscribe

    • setPlayerDisconnected

      public void setPlayerDisconnected(String username)
      Sets the player to disconnected when they quit It checks the current game status and acts accordingly
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player that was disconnected

    • setRandomInitialization

      public void setRandomInitialization(String username) throws NotExistingPlayerException
      Invoked when the player quits during the game setup It gives the player a random marker, starter card and secret objective card
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      Throws:
      NotExistingPlayerException - when the player doesn't exist

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage(String message, String sender)
      Sends a chat message to the players that have to receive it
      Parameters:
      message - the content of the message to be sent
      sender - the username of the sender

    • reconnectPlayerToGame

      public void reconnectPlayerToGame(String username) throws NotExistingPlayerException
      Reconnects a player after they quit the game
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player to reconnect
      Throws:
      NotExistingPlayerException - when the player was not part of the game before reconnecting
